Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Suite in E minor, BWV 996

c. 1715?

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 15' 30"

  • 1. Praeludio
  • 2. Allemande
  • 3. Courante
  • 4. Sarabande
  • 5. Bourrée
  • 6. Gigue

This suite was written for lute-harpsichord, but works naturally and effectively for harpsichord (or piano).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 10 · BA 5044-01 · Einzeln überlieferte Klavierwerke II / Kompositionen für Lauteninstrumente · ed. Hartwig Eichberg / Thomas Kohlhase

1. Praeludio

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Allemande

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Courante

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Sarabande

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

5. Bourrée

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

6. Gigue

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5
